results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates oxygen glucose deprivation/reoxygenation-induced pulmonary endothelial barrier dysfunction by restoring cell-cell junctions and actin cytoskeleton dynamics via the PI3K/Akt signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: We explored the therapeutic potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@) in endothelial cells subjected to @CHEMICAL_Oxygen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010100 @@@oxygen@@@-@CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ deprivation/reoxygenation (@<m>DISEASE_Osteoglophonic_dwarfism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536050 @@@OGD@@@/R).
